summary: Highly motivated and results-oriented Research Assistant with 2+ years of experience in developing and implementing Machine Learning models, specializing in Computer Vision and LLMs. Proven ability to research, experiment, and apply state-of-the-art deep learning techniques for image, video, voice, and text analytics.  Passionate about building scalable AI solutions and contributing to a team that values innovation and practicality.

technical: Computer Vision (object detection, object classification, object tracking)
LLMs (fine-tuning, training, deploying GPT, BERT, LLaMA)

experience.title: Research Assistant
responsibilities: Researched, experimented with, and applied state-of-the-art deep learning techniques for voice conversion, computer vision, and NLP.
Developed and implemented GANs, Diffusion Models, and Graph Convolution Networks for various applications.
Collaborated on deep learning research with the National Science and Technology Development Agency (NSTDA).
Served as a Teacher Assistant for a Deep Learning Bootcamp, guiding students on practical implementation of ML models.

experience.title: Student Researcher
experience.company: Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD)
responsibilities: Benchmarked LLMs (OpenAI, Llama3, Mistral, Gemini AI) for qualitative analysis applications using Ollama and LLM Studio.
Fine-tuned and deployed LLM models for specific tasks.

experience.title: Student Researcher
responsibilities: Led the ORB-SLAM refactoring project, overseeing a team and ensuring successful implementation.
Refactored SLAM algorithms, OpenCV, Sparse Bundle Adjustment algorithms, and linear/non-linear optimization technologies using C/C++.

experience.title: Founder
responsibilities: Founded the first robotics competition in Myanmar, fostering a community of robotics enthusiasts.
Developed and implemented game rules for the competition.
Organized the robotics community in Myanmar for research purposes and STEM education initiatives.

education.institution: King Mongkuts University of Technology Thonburi (KMUTT)

projects.name: Voice Conversion For Alaryngeal Speakers using WavLM, KNN VC
projects.description: Developed a voice conversion model for alaryngeal speakers leveraging WavLM and KNN VC.

projects.name: Burmese GPT using Llama2 Model and WordPiece BPE Tokenizer
projects.description: Created a Burmese GPT model using the Llama2 architecture and WordPiece BPE tokenizer.

projects.name: ORBSLAM Refactoring
projects.description: Refactored the ORB-SLAM algorithm to improve performance and maintainability.
